page.shortlink: api sql namespace resultset tocsvfile function
page.description: Write a ResultSet to a file in Comma Separated Variable (CSV) format.

prototypes.prototype: dim result as C = ToCSVFile(TargetFile as C [ IncludeHeaderRow as L = .f. [, RowsToCopy as N = -1 [, StartRow as N = -1 [, UpperCaseNames as L = .f. [, DateTimeFormat as C = "" [, DateFormat as C = "" [, TextToSubstituteForBinary as C]]]]]]])

description.p: Default = *[xb:.f.]*. If true, the first row in the result will be the column names.
Default = *[xb:-1]* (copy all rows). The number of rows to copy.
Default = *[xb:-1]* (start with next row in the result set). The starting row.
Default = *[xb:.f.]*. If true and the header row is included, the header row column names will be converted to uppercase.

return.name: result
return.description: Returns *[xb:.T.]* if the data was successfully saved to a CSV file. If result is *[xb:.F.]*, the file was not created. Check the result of SQL::ResultSet's callResult object for more info about the error.

section.example:
dim cn as SQL::Connection
' open the connection if (cn.open("::Name::conn")) then
' Query the database if (cn.execute("SELECT * FROM Customers") then
' Save the query to a CSV file: dim filename as c = "C:/customers.txt" if (cn.resultSet.toCSVFile(filename)) then ui_msg_box("Success!","Customer query written to " + filename) else ' CSV File creation failed. Check the callResult for more info. showvar(cn.resultSet.callResult) end if else ' SELECT failed. Check callResult for more info. showvar(cn.callResult) end if cn.close() else ' Unable to establish connection. Check callResult for more info. showvar(cn.callResult) end if
